All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseNode
Any node implementation should implement this interface.
Block
Block representation in Proof-of-Validation.
BlockInventory
Collects the identifiers of unique blocks at each height.
ChurnGenerator
Interface for the churn generators.
Client
Integrita client implementation.
CollectTransactionsEvent
Collects Transactions submitted to a node.
ConfirmBlockEvent
It checks validation of block event in a node.
ConfirmTransactionEvent
Checks validation of transaction event.
Constants
Global constants used across codebase.
Constants.Histogram
Contains default constant values for histogram collectors.
Constants.Namespace
General namespaces used for metric collection.
Counter
A base interface for counter collector.
DeliverLatestBlockEvent
updates nodes block to the latestBlock.
DeliverTransactionsEvent
Delivers transaction to a node.
Encoder
Encoder is an interface for encoding and decoding events into byte arrays and vice versa.
Event
Event is a marker interface for all events, it abstracts the unit of communications between the nodes at the application layer, i.e., layer 7 of the OSI model.
Eventually
Eventually is a helper class for testing.
ExponentialGenerator
ExponentialGenerator is a class that generates random numbers according to an exponential distribution.
ExponentialGeneratorTest
 
Factory
Factory supports creating several types of nodes each with a certain instances.
FixtureEvent
A basic Event to use to check whether Underlays coded correctly.
FixtureEvent
A basic Event to use to check whether Utils coded correctly.
FixtureNode
A basic BaseNode to check whether Underlays coded correctly or not.
FixtureNode
A basic BaseNode to check whether Utils coded correctly or not.
Fixtures
 
Gauge
A base interface for gauge collector.
GaussianGenerator
GaussianGenerator is a class implementing a generator for churn values based on the Gaussian (normal) distribution.
GaussianGeneratorTest
Test class for GaussianGenerator class.
GetLatestBlockEvent
Getter of the latest block event.
Hash
Hash implementation used in Merkle tree.
HelloEvent
HelloEvent is an event which enables node to send "Thank You" if the message is "Hello" else sends "Hello" message back to that node.
HisoryTreeStoreTest
 
Histogram
A base interface for histogram collector.
HistoryTreeNode
implementation of a decentralized history tree as instructed in Integrita.
HistoryTreeNodeTest
 
HistoryTreeStore
storage unit of the history tree.
Identifier
Represents a 32-byte unique identifier.
IdentifierGenerator
Generates unique identifiers.
JavaRmiHost
Represents the Java RMI Service implementation.
JavaRmiService
Represents a Java RMI Service.
JavaRmiUnderlay
Java RMI connection underlay implementation.
LatencyGenerator
Creates synthetic and symmetric latecy between nodes.
LatencyGeneratorTest
 
LightChainMetrics
Metrics collector for LightChain simulations.
LightChainNode
A LightChainNode represents a single node of the LightChain protocol.
LocalHandler
Sends request to a middle layer.
LocalUnderlay
Serves as the LocalUnderlay layer of the simulator.
Logger
Encapsulates logger for opera project.
Main
Hello Servers is a simulator example which consist of 5 nodes.
Main
Integrita simulation.
Message
Message is the unit of communications between the nodes at the networking layer of Opera.
MetricServer
HTTP Server constructor class for the Prometheus exposer server.
MetricsNetwork
Creates a metrics collection network that is composed of a grafana and a prometheus containers.
MyNode
MyNode is a basenode to be fixture node for the hello servers simulation.
Network
Represents the high level networking layer of the individual nodes.
NetworkCollector
A singleton class which collects metrics for the network layer.
NetworkProtocol
Available list of networking protocols.
NodeAddress
holds the address of a node of the history tree.
NodeAddressTest
 
NoopCollector
Noop Collector is a no operation metric collector.
NoopOrchestrator
NoopOrchestrator implements an orchestrator for testing.
OperaCounter
Implements the Counter collector for Opera.
OperaGauge
Implements the Gauge collector for Opera.
OperaHistogram
Implements the histogram metric collector for Opera.
OperaLogger
Encapsulates logger for opera project.
OperaMiddlewareCollector
A singleton class which collects metrics for the network layer.
OperationType
leaves of history tree are either Insert or Delete.
Orchestrator
Orchestrator is an interface for Simulator.
Pull
Pull event encapsulates a client-side pull request to the server.
PullResp
PullResp event encapsulates a sever-side response to the client's pull request.
Push
Push event encapsulates a client-side push request to the server.
PushResp
PushResp encapsulates the server-side reply to a client's push request.
Recipe
Recipe is utilized by node factory to create a certain number of a specific type of node for simulation.
SerializableEncoder
Encoder is an implementation of the Encoder interface which uses Java's built-in object serialization and deserialization to convert events to byte arrays and back.
Server
Integrita server implementation.
ServerTest
 
SharedVariable
local static variable between the nodes with a buffer size of 1 (any two consecutive writing on the same variable is forbidden).
Signature
signature implementation.
SignatureTest
 
SimpleEntryComparable<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
Can be used to construct entries that comparable.
Simulation
Simulation uses simulator to simulate an event with given number of given node and in a given duration of time.
Simulator
Simulator simulates situations between nodes with actions performed between the nodes.
SimulatorMetricsCollector
SimulatorMetricsCollector is the metrics collector for the core simulator's functionalities.
StatusCode
Indicates the success or failure of client request from the servers.
Store
storage api.
SubmitBlockEvent
Appends new block to the node.
SubmitTransactionEvent
Adds a new transaction to a node.
TcpHandler
Represents a thread that handles an incoming tcp request and emits a response.
TcpListener
Implements a routine that continuously listens a local tcp port and delegates the handling of each received request to a `TCPHandler` thread.
TcpUnderlay
tcp underlay implementation.
Transaction
Transaction representation in Proof-of-Validation.
UdpHandler
Represents a thread that handles a udp request and emits a response.
UdpListener
Implements a routine that continuously listens a local udp port for requests and responses, and delegates the handling of each received request to a `UDPHandler` thread and each received response to the main `UDPUnderlay` thread.
UdpUnderlay
udp underlay implementation.
UdpUtils
Contains various static helper methods to be used by the udp underlay implementation.
Underlay
Represents the underlay layer of the simulator.
UnderlayFactory
UnderlayFactory is a factory which consists of Underlays.
UnderlayTest
Tests the communication and termination of every network underlay.
UniformGenerator
Implementing Uniform distribution for generating churn values.
User
contains user-related information.
ValidateBlockEvent
Validates the given block for the node.
ValidateTransactionEvent
Validates the given transaction for the node.
WeibullGenerator
This class implements the Weibull distribution to generate churn values.
WeibullGeneratorTest
This is a class used to test the WeibullGenerator class.
